Name: Raider Squad
Description:
Squad composed of Raider agents. Raider Squad can engage enemies head to head. Can use Cover Command.

Can attack ground.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Switch the weapon of this tactic squad.
Root.Name: Switch Armory

Root.Tooltip: Command the captain to concentrate psychic energy and throw it as an invisible bomb, causing 200 points of damage to the target unit.
Root.Name: Mind Bomb

Root.Tooltip: Raider Squad are equipped with mysterious shield equipment. Each member has additional 130 shield pt. If the shield is destroyed, it will not able to regenerate for a while. Raider Squad can travel up and down cliffs.
Root.Name: Alien Shield

Root.Tooltip: Gestalt Zero's tactic squad can gain experience in combat to achieve higher ranking, gaining additional abilities and have slightly improved stats. Squad will gain experience equal to twice of the supply cost for every enemy unit killed nearby. If a tactic squad dealt the killing blow, it will gain additional 100% experience.
Root.Name: Gestalt Ranking

Root.Tooltip:
Grant each Squad member additional 150 health, 4 armor, and 15% dmg reduction.
Active skill will let the Squad blink to target direction.
Root.Name: Terminator EXO Teleport

Root.Tooltip: Receive a dose of Regenerative Stim. It will continuously heal the squad and increase their speed by 20%. Last 20 sec.
Root.Name: Regenerative Stim

Root.Tooltip: Jump to target location and knock off nearby enemy ground units after landing.
Root.Name: Jetpack

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Recruit a soldier for the squad. At most 4 soldiers can be recruited.
Root.Name: Recruit Soldier

Root.Tooltip:
Order all tactic bombers to launch a round of specialized smoke grenades to target area. Ally units within the smoke will receive less dmg and have faster movement speed, while enemy units will have way less atk range and visions. Last 15 sec.

Airstrike Order CD applies to all Tactic Squad.
More Gestalt Bomber Platforms you have, larger the area Airstrike Order can apply to.
Root.Name: Cover Command

Root.Tooltip:
Order all tactic bombers to launch a round of specialized smoke grenades to target area. Ally units within the smoke will receive less dmg and have faster movement speed, while enemy units will have way less atk range and visions. Last 15 sec.

Airstrike Order CD applies to all Tactic Squad.
More Gestalt Bomber Platforms you have, larger the area Airstrike Order can apply to.
Root.Name: Cover Command

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Plasma Halberd. Basic melee weapon.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Equip Plasma Halberd

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Flaming Crossbow. Effective against light units and can deal aoe dmg.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Flaming Crossbow

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Flaming Crossbow. Effective against light units and can deal aoe dmg.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Equip Flaming Crossbow

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Lightning Claw. Weapon with rapid attack speed and can deal aoe damage by EMP.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Lightning Claw

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Lightning Claw. Weapon with rapid attack speed and can deal aoe damage by EMP.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Lightning Claw

0002.Tooltip:
Purchase and equip Thunder Hammer. Effective against armored and massive unit. Deal twice the dmg to shield.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Thunder Hammer

0002.Tooltip:
Equip Thunder Hammer. Effective against armored and massive unit. Deal twice the dmg to shield.

Can attack ground.
0002.Name: Equip Thunder Hammer

0002.Tooltip: Purchasing and equipping an additional Storm Shield will not replace your current weapon. Grants team members 10 points of additional armor and reduces damage taken by 30%.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Storm Shield

0002.Tooltip: Equipping additional Storm Shield will not replace the current weapon. Grants team members 10 points of additional armor and reduces damage taken by 30%.
0002.Name: Equip Storm Shield

0002.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
0002.Name: Cancel

0002.Tooltip: Purchase and equip Psionic Armor, this will not replace currently equipped weapon. squad is able to reduce dmg down to 30 and reduce enemies's movement speed by 35%.
0002.Name: Purchase And Equip Psionic Armor

0002.Tooltip: Equip Psionic Armor, this will not replace currently equipped weapon. squad is able to reduce dmg down to 30 and reduce enemies's movement speed by 35%.
0002.Name: Equip Psionic Armor
